entry.title: father
entry.summary:
Author: balloongiirl

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,239Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: "'Show me how you sinned.'Your cheeks were flushed, and your hair fell in your face as you hiked up your lacy church dress. 'Yes, Father.' The rosary around your neck hung low. If your clothes were off, Jason bet it fell just below your navel. You had the cutest set of cotton shorts under your dress. You were so holy, so perfect." or, father jason crawled out of his grave years ago. now, he's a man of faith. that is, until he sees you.

entry.title: The trees will fall (but i will keep standing by you)
entry.summary:
Author: Morningstar_knight

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,654Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 4

Summary: District 7. The Lumber District. It hurts when you are reaped. It hurts being taken from your family. It hurts seeing your fellow Tribute, Jason Todd, and knowing you two probably won’t survive this years Hunger Games. (I’ll try to update every 2 weeks. It’s a little bit of time in between but i want to make sure each chapter is longer. Thanks!)

entry.title: Attention
entry.summary:
Author: LicoricexWitch

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,282Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 62

Summary: You've always been obsessed with superheroes, ever since you were a little kid.You moved to Gotham all alone with stars in your eyes for undergrad before the cold reality of city-living set in. The streets were mean and people weren't as kind as they were back home. It was hard to make friends and you preferred to stay inside, making you even lonelier. You were a regular fish out of water, not a lot of close friends or family, living all alone--the perfect target for someone with not-so-nice intentions.They always said not to meet your heroes because they could never live up to your expectations. Or sometimes, they weren't a hero at all.

entry.title: So smile!
entry.summary:
Author: crying_outlad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,410Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 646

Summary: You'd always heard the phrase "be careful what you wish for", but you had never paid it any mind. And though growing up you had wished, prayed even, for your family's attention, the yearning had slowed down considerably, enough for you to choose to move out from the hell that had become your life.But just before you can leave the old, creaky manor, your wishes finally come true. And it's only after that you learn to appreciate what you had, awful as it was. But maybe, just maybe, you can escape your suffocating family.------------------Yandere! Batfam x Neglected Male! Reader.My Tumblr is the basically same as my AO3 @ lol.@crying-outlad if you're interested. This is the only post there so far anyway.

entry.title: Outsiders Inspired Batboys: Jason Todd x Chubby! Reader x Tim Drake
entry.summary:
Author: River_Shayde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,694Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Ever wonder what would happen if Dick had to raise Jason, Tim, and Damian during the 1960s in Gotham? What if they all met a once privileged girl who lost everything and now has to acclimate life in the greaser side of town? How will they all interact and face the villains, socs, and family issues that make up their daily life?Reader turns 18 a few days after meeting the family, and this will mainly be a Jason and Tim love story. I might do two ending depending on how I feel and the direction that the story goes. Protective vibes will be in play.Setting inspired by Grease and the Outsiders.

entry.title: we're all reaching out to find another hand
entry.summary:
Author: soter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,858Chapters: 7/18Kudos: 97

Summary: “I know you’re a meta,” you blurt. Jason stares. “What.” “I saw your hand—I saw the cut and the blood, but then, it was healed, somehow, right, and like, I know I wasn’t supposed to see that and then I felt really bad about it and I wanted to let you know that I know but I didn’t want you to think I was going to, like, blackmail you—” “Blackmail me?” “Of course not,” you quickly say. “Never. No. That’s horrible. Can you imagine what would happen if it got out?” You wince. “Sorry, stupid question, you probably have.”or in which you discover that your neighbor, Jason Todd, is a metahuman, try to compensate, and things get a little... weird.

entry.title: Red Hood, Green Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Persadol

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 133,776Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 192

Summary: Jason Todd has died before-and he hasn't quite come back whole. Haunted by shadows of his past and the weight of justice in Gotham, he finds comfort only in silence and the static crackle of Alfred's voice in his comms.That is, until the night a portal rips open above him and a very unexpected visitor-blue-skinned, horned, and definitely not from this world-crashes straight into his life. Literally.You're a druid from the forests of the Forgotten Realms, on a peaceful path of healing and harmony… until a bandit ambush and a wild spell gone wrong land you flat on top of a masked stranger in a dark, alien city.Jason doesn't do magic. You don't do guns. But somehow, between Gotham rooftops and druidic spells, trauma and trust, gunfire and green growth-you might just change each other's worlds.

entry.title: People Aren't Good
entry.summary:
Author: Miss_nightshade

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,844Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 28

Summary: Hecate has spent her life tucked into the bruised edges of Gotham’s Narrows, pretending to be a small, harmless girl with nothing worth noticing. It’s a fragile lie, but it holds. She goes to school. She walks home alone. She returns to a house that feels older than she is, a place that hums with magic she refuses to touch. She keeps her power buried. She ignores the ancient voices whispering inside her. She does everything she can to stay unseen. And for years, it works. Until the night it doesn’t.
